title: When the enemy laner's badmouthing you and you totally destroy them
body:
https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2016-05/2/11/enhanced/webdr15/anigif_enhanced-25638-1462202385-7.gif

Edit;
Over, and over, and over, and over, and over
https://i.imgur.com/d8hkYvz.gif

replies.body:
When you realise The mountain and Sion are basically the same person.
Think about it...

I always thought he looked a lot like King of Clubs Mordekaiser^^

Red eyes, undead, massive, crushes people 24/7.

But yes, I see the resemblance to Sion^^

Sion was a huge hulking guy, who wouldn't easily go down in battle
The mountain was a huge hulking guy, who wouldn't go down easily in battle

Sion died on the battle field, but crushed J1's skull before he died.
The mountain ''died'' or got very close to dying in an arena, but crushed a guys skull before he ''died''

Sion got revived by Vladimir, using blood magic.
The mountain got ''revived'' by a creepy guy, experimenting with his blood.

Sions skin is grey and his eyes are red
The mountains skin is grey and his eyes are red

His golden armor does look a lot like King of Clubs Morde though
Didn't Sion get revived by LeBlanc and the Black Rose?
Vladimir is a member of the black rose, Leblanc made it all happen, but Vladimir performed the ritual
WTF I had no idea Vladimir was a member of the black rose....This kind of shit is why Riot should never have done away with the old lore...Everything is all confused (to me, maybe not to others)
No, but Jarvan 4 is supposedly LeBlanc in disguise.
Eh wat? What has that got to do with Sion's resurrection? And the Black Rose DID resurrect Sion, look: http://promo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/reborn/
Report Rito for plagiarism
BTW inspirations from ASoIaF came even before the show in other games. WarCraft took inspiration or two as well.
And inspirations from ASoIaF came from history and LotR.
Now we must find out whom History stole from? Nobody's clear in this game.
He actually didn't die in the arena ('tleast not in the books), but after several days of horrible screams that entire Red Keep could hear.
Yeah it wasn't 100% clear to me IF or When the mountain died, so I said ''died'' :P
Pimpkaiser.
https://img.pandawhale.com/post-54282-Jaqen-Hghar-Imgur-upvote-gif-ej6p.gif
http://imgur.com/nn2z9hi
Just a question, is this also a representation of what Dark Souls will do to you?

It will destroy you, leave you as nothing but ashes...
And out of these ashes you shall rise anew, having "Gotten Gud", your body and spirit in ruin but your struggling having made you succeed in your journey.

So, yes.
Pretty much.

or you'll surrender,lose interest, give up on the game and forget it, or  what fits better, go hollow 

its awesome how it can fit both the player and the character in game 

<3 dark souls
I mean if you enjoy complete and utter masochism then Dark Souls/Bloodborne is what you need.

it aint as hard as people make it seem, i think that most games are way too easy with thousands of autosaves 
well in ds1 the 2 knights in anor londo and the 4 kings were way too hard and because of them i gave up on the game for some months, but the other bosses werent as hard

i love this game combat style its so different from god of war and games alike. it makes you learn the enemy moves and know your limits instead of just pressing square 400 times and dodging occasionally 

awww i need a ps4, sad its freaking expensive in my country, still wanna play bloodborne seems fun
How did you find Ornstein and Smough hard? Like come on man, just get the God of the Sun himself in some Jolly co-operation
ITS NOT THAT EASY GETTING SOLAIR TO GET INTO THAT GODDAMN FIGHT. half the time for me he keeps getting stuck on a pillar. eventually "got gud" and beat it XD
Distraction tactics, and I-frams op.
the ai in that game is awful, sunbro was just tanking for me, i was able to win that fight cause sunbro lasted for the second part of the fight, took 500 tries

henever made it into the bossfight room

id have the increased damage and hp on smough and ornstein but he wasnt actually there XD
i actually killed everyone in the room and led him to the fog like he was a small child, here hold my hands and lets go down the stair, otherwise you'll fall and lose half of your hp
No,  it'll just frustrate you occasionally because of how glitchy and clunky it is and you'll realize that it is overrated.

The second gif is in the same stroke as the drums of the music I heard when I opened the thread.
Beatiful

When the enemy Fiora thinks she can fight you as Mordekaiser himself

FTFY
And they still bad mouth you saying you can only get them with an overpowered champ but your playing a normal champ and their the one playing the overpowered champ...
But no matter how much you do... they won't... stoooop... TALKING. (Just a little background to where the second gif fits in.)
I'v got banned off the boards for less graphic photos than this XD. im pretty sure thats part of his skull sticking to the wall and then falling off.
No, they just don't like you. I've posted Watchmen, Saving Private Ryan, Hateful 8, and more gory gifs and I've received nothing but up-votes or down votes
Cause more people are getting a thick skin.
http://49.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lrdme2SvME1qe5c86o1_500.gif
OMG one time the enemy team were all saying why don't you ff? In all chat and my team ended up coming back and winning so in after game chat we all said why didn't you ff? It felt so good!
Whenever the enemy team says that, I tell myself to not FF.

The second gif really showcases how I feel when I'm dominating a game as Sion. Just keep on CCing the enemy team until they die. 

Again and again.
Holy gore
Thanks for turning this into a meme. Thank you so much.
I actually playing with a zed and he was basically doing crap and he was saying he's a God and I'm like *facepalm* and basically I was doing. Betyer
